verses.verse: Every wise <WH2454> woman <WH802> buildeth <WH1129> her house <WH1004>; But the foolish <WH200> plucketh it down <WH2040> with her own hands <WH3027>.
He that walketh <WH1980> in his uprightness <WH3476> feareth <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068>; But he that is perverse <WH3868> in his ways <WH1870> despiseth him <WH959>.
In the mouth <WH6310> of the foolish <WH191> is a rod <WH2415> for his pride <WH1346>; But the lips <WH8193> of the wise <WH2450> shall preserve them <WH8104>.
Where no oxen <WH504> are <WH18>, the crib is clean <WH1249>; But much <WH7230> increase <WH8393> is by the strength <WH3581> of the ox <WH7794>.
A faithful <WH529> witness <WH5707> will not lie <WH3577>; But a false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> uttereth <WH6315> lies <WH3576>.
A scoffer <WH3887> seeketh <WH1245> wisdom <WH2451>, and findeth it not <WH1847>; But knowledge is easy <WH7043> unto him that hath understanding <WH995>.
Go <WH3212> into the presence <WH5048> of a foolish <WH3684> man <WH376>, And thou shalt not perceive <WH3045> in him the lips <WH8193> of knowledge <WH1847>.
The wisdom <WH2451> of the prudent <WH6175> is to understand <WH995> his way <WH1870>; But the folly <WH200> of fools <WH3684> is deceit <WH4820>.
A trespass-offering <WH817> mocketh <WH3887> fools <WH191>; But among the upright <WH3477> there is good will <WH7522>.
The heart <WH3820> knoweth <WH3045> its own <WH5315> bitterness <WH4787>; And a stranger <WH2114> doth not intermeddle <WH6148> with its joy <WH8057>.
The house <WH1004> of the wicked <WH7563> shall be overthrown <WH8045>; But the tent <WH168> of the upright <WH3477> shall flourish <WH6524>.
There is <WH3426> a way <WH1870> which seemeth right <WH3477> unto <WH6440> a man <WH376>; But the end <WH319> thereof are the ways <WH1870> of death <WH4194>.
Even in laughter <WH7814> the heart <WH3820> is sorrowful <WH3510>; And the end <WH319> of mirth <WH8057> is heaviness <WH8424>.
The backslider <WH5472> in heart <WH3820> shall be filled <WH7646> with his own ways <WH1870>; And a good <WH2896> man shall be satisfied from himself <WH376>.
The simple <WH6612> believeth <WH539> every word <WH1697>; But the prudent <WH6175> man looketh well <WH995> to his going <WH838>.
A wise <WH2450> man feareth <WH3373>, and departeth <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>; But the fool <WH3684> beareth himself insolently <WH5674>, and is confident <WH982>.
He that is soon <WH7116> angry <WH639> will deal <WH6213> foolishly <WH200>; And a man <WH376> of wicked devices <WH4209> is hated <WH8130>.
The simple <WH6612> inherit <WH5157> folly <WH200>; But the prudent <WH6175> are crowned <WH3803> with knowledge <WH1847>.
The evil <WH7451> bow <WH7817> down before <WH6440> the good <WH2896>; And the wicked <WH7563>, at the gates <WH8179> of the righteous <WH6662>.
The poor <WH7326> is hated <WH8130> even of his own neighbor <WH7453>; But the rich <WH6223> hath many <WH7227> friends <WH157>.
He that despiseth <WH936> his neighbor <WH7453> sinneth <WH2398>; But he that hath pity <WH2603> on the poor <WH6035>, happy is he <WH835>.
Do they not err <WH8582> that devise <WH2790> evil <WH7451>? But mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> shall be to them that devise <WH2790> good <WH2896>.
In all labor <WH6089> there is profit <WH4195>; But the talk <WH1697> of the lips <WH8193> tendeth only to penury <WH4270>.
The crown <WH5850> of the wise <WH2450> is their riches <WH6239>; But the folly <WH200> of fools <WH3684> is only folly <WH200>.
A true <WH571> witness <WH5707> delivereth <WH5337> souls <WH5315>; But he that uttereth <WH6315> lies <WH3577> causeth deceit <WH4820>.
In the fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068> is strong <WH5797> confidence <WH4009>; And his children <WH1121> shall have a place of refuge <WH4268>.
The fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068> is a fountain <WH4726> of life <WH2416>, That one may depart <WH5493> from the snares <WH4170> of death <WH4194>.
In the multitude <WH7230> of people <WH5971> is the king <WH4428>'s glory <WH1927>; But in the want <WH657> of people <WH3816> is the destruction <WH4288> of the prince <WH7333>.
He that is slow <WH750> to anger <WH639> is of great <WH7227> understanding <WH8394>; But he that is hasty <WH7116> of spirit <WH7307> exalteth <WH7311> folly <WH200>.
A tranquil <WH4832> heart <WH3820> is the life <WH2416> of the flesh <WH1320>; But envy <WH7068> is the rottenness <WH7538> of the bones <WH6106>.
He that oppresseth <WH6231> the poor <WH1800> reproacheth <WH2778> his Maker <WH6213>; But he that hath mercy <WH2603> on the needy <WH34> honoreth him <WH3513>.
The wicked <WH7563> is thrust down <WH1760> in his evil-doing <WH7451>; But the righteous <WH6662> hath a refuge <WH2620> in his death <WH4194>.
Wisdom <WH2451> resteth <WH5117> in the heart <WH3820> of him that hath understanding <WH995>; But that which is in the inward <WH7130> part of fools <WH3684> is made known <WH3045>.
Righteousness <WH6666> exalteth <WH7311> a nation <WH1471>; But sin <WH2403> is a reproach <WH2617> to any people <WH3816>.
The king <WH4428>'s favor <WH7522> is toward a servant <WH5650> that dealeth wisely <WH7919>; But his wrath <WH5678> will be against him that causeth shame <WH954>.
